name: CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 and Niacinamide
about: What it is: A color-correcting, medium-coverage skin tint formulated with brightening glow serum and SPF 40 that delivers an immediate, visibly healthy glow...Skin Type: Normal, Dry, and Combination..Coverage: Medium.Finish: Radiant.Formulation: Liquid..SPF: SPF Over 30Highlighted Ingredients:.- Niacinamide: Visibly brightens, smooths texture, and reduces the look of dark spots and large pores..- Hyaluronic Acid: Quickly plumps the look of skin and hydrates..- Green Tea Extract: Protects against environmental aggressors for healthy-looking skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, phthalates, mineral oil, and sulfates SLS & SLES...What Else You Need to Know: With a 90 percent skincare base, this medium-coverage, buildable foundation delivers an immediate, healthy glow. It’s formulated with SPF 40 and delivers visibly brighter skin in just four weeks. This foundation is formulated with two percent niacinamide, hyaluronic acid, and green tea extract. It’s clinically tested to visibly brighten skin and visibly improve skin texture, softness, and uneven skin tone...Clinical Results: In a consumer test based on bare skin after 4 weeks of use:.- 93% said skin feels moisturized.- 91% said skin feels smoother.- 87% said complexion looks brighter
ingredients: -Niacinamide: Visibly brightens, smooths texture, and reduces the look of dark spots and large pores..-Hyaluronic Acid: Quickly plumps the look of skin and hydrates..-Green Tea Extract: Protects against environmental aggressors for healthy-looking skin....Homosalate 7.34%, Octisalate 5.0%, Octocrylene 6.0%, Water, Glycerin, Caprylyl Methicone, Dimethicone, Butyloctyl Salicylate, Cetyl Peg/Ppg-10/1 Dimethicone, Niacinamide, Propanediol, Dimethicone/Peg-10/15 Crosspolymer, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Phenoxyethanol, Sodium Chloride, Butylene Glycol, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Fragrance, Chlorphenesin, Caprylyl Glycol, Snail Secretion Filtrate, Silica Silylate, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Limonene, Simethicone, Maltodextrin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Adenosine, Ethyl Hexanediol, Dipropylene Glycol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Citral, Linalool, Sodium Citrate, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Tocopherol, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate. May Contain: Iron Oxides, Titanium Dioxide.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply one to two pumps of CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 to clean skin as the last step of your skincare routine..-Use the Heavenly Skin CC+ Skin-Perfecting #702 brush (sold separately) to effortlessly buff and blend foundation onto your face, neck, and décolleté for an immediate healthy glow..-Apply more product as needed to build to your desired level of coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Picked this up on recommendation when I went in for a color match. I have super pale, difficult to color match skin. Most brands don't have a shade match for me or they oxidize so bad I can't wear it. Nars has my shade but all formulas break me out. I've always found with my natural skin tone that a lot of foundations dry down and look chalky if they don't oxidize. I have combo skin, on the oilier side in my t zone area, acne prone and sensitive too. This does not break me out or bother my skin. I think because of the glow it doesn't appear chalky in my shade and I love that but its also not too glowy. It gives medium coverage like it claims to. I apply with a sponge after applying the IT cosmetics concealer. This does seperate some around my nose by the end of the day, but I can tap around and blend it back out. I have that issue with all foundations. I do think this is way to pricey, it should be more in the $30 range at most- but a little also goes a long way for me. A pump covers my entire face. If you want more coverage, I recommend the original formula or to use the concealer in spot areas before applying this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really want to like this. It just greasy and it doesn't layer well with bronzer, blush, powder, and concealer. The foundation is separating from my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color may have selected incorrectly I am wearing Neutral Medium in the photo. I have oily combo skin and have no issue setting this, I can use it without primer or moisturizer as it is skincare on its own. I would say if it isn’t setting for people they may not be resting previous layers or applying it to dry skin. I am notorious for having makeup meltdowns. I used it with milk dewy primer and then set it with the milk dewy setting spray applied with a sponge. Although I’m not the hugest fan of that setting spray hence the sponge application I got on the subway in July, had brunch, was out all day and was fine. Application is key. I love this foundation.

reviews.review_title: Must have in your daily makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have sensitive skin and was nervous to try this product but I have been using it for a week now and I’m loving it! Really easy and good for on the go. Very natural tint but buildable coverage. Gives a beautiful glow and is very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried. I really, really, reallyyyy did. I tried with my primer/without/completely bare...no matter if just a thin layer or a little more for coverage, it just felt and looked GREASY. Not dewy or glowing (lol). Literally like I just used my 80 year old grandmother's hand lotion on my face. It even smells like her hand lotion. At 32, I'll hold off on the senior citizen-esque feel/smell. Personally, I wouldn't call this a foundation whatsoever. Tinted moisturizer 100% and boy oh boy, they do mean MOISTURIZER. A shame, I was hoping so badly to find something lightweight but buildable. With this texas heat, I do not need the extra slippery feeling on my face. The humidity does that all on its own just fine...not to mention, I swear this stuff would sting from time to time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried so many different formulas for daily lightweight, SPF coverage.  This is the best one, by far.  I like it 10x more that the Ilia skin tint - and I love Ilia products, but in this particular category, CC+ has Ilia beat.  It gives me a lightweight tint that's super easy to blend, still lets my skin shine through, bit of a glow (but not greasy).  Top-tier product and I'll keep coming back for more as long as they don't change the formula.

reviews.review_title: Once dry, tint appears splotchy and uneven
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applied evenly in the store and appeared dewy and cohesive while wet. Unfortunately, that dissipated upon drying. The tint lifted and became splotchy, creased and uneven. When I tried to correct spots, it quickly pilled and flaked off. Attempts to correct / even it out failed until the product was almost entirely removed.   I wanted medium coverage but, once this dries the tint appears streak, uneven, splotchy and VERY noticeable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am writing a review in regards to my recent Sephora purchase.  I was looking for a tinted moisturizer for myself, and this brand was suggested to me. I had Wonderful consult with Ella, I believe, and she was able to quickly identify my concerns an. As an aging wonton my 50’s, Ella represented my age group and I was grateful that a salesperson could relate to my concerns. I applied the product this morning and it looks great. Fantastic. And I would like to thank Ella for this. The tint applies on smooth and not thick. Dried quickly and matches perfectly to my skin tone. I am very pleased. And thank you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Have had this for a while and will try it out very now and then. Stings my face every time I try to wear it!! Regardless of if I have a thick moisturizer on under or just a calming essence, etc.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for a dewy and natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve been using this product for over a few weeks, and while I absolutely love it, I don’t think it will be everyone’s cup of tea. It leaves a dewy, natural, glowing finish, which I sometimes make more matte with a sheer setting powder if I know I’ll be out and sweating a lot during the day. I really wanted a “3 in 1” product (moisturizer, foundation, and sunscreen) and I feel like this checks all those boxes adequately. I especially love that the product does not crease at all during the day, no matter how much you scrunch your face and sweat. If you’re looking for something more matte or more full coverage, it might not be for you, as I feel like the coverage is more similar to a skin tint than an actual foundation. Also, it is super hydrating but doesn’t leave my face feeling oily- a welcomed feature for my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Huge disappointment. Greasy, sat on skin and oxidized so much, you'd think it was meant to do so. One of the worst products I've ever tried.

reviews.review_title: Everyday staple for me - can't change my mind

I feel like not a lot of people know about it so I have to give it it's flowers it really is super nice and has great coverage while protecting your skin. Great for post-peel when your skin is finally healed but still needs sun protection.

reviews.review_text: This is my favorite cc cream Ive ever used. It looks absolutely phenomenal on the skin (truly a second layer of skin, not makeup). I’ve bought it twice now and will continue to buy it. Doesn’t break you out and is very builadbke.

reviews.review_title: My fave cc cream of all time

reviews.review_text: second time buying this cc cream, it's a must in my routine. I am definitely sticking to this product. there's no way it's replaceable, love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: You need to have it. Glow and coverage are insane. This one is really perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the way this applied, and it looked beautiful on my combination skin. However, this product made my eyes burn horribly. I didn't use it in the area immediately around my eyes, so I was surprised when I did some trial and error testing to figure out which product was making my eyes water and burn. My eyes watered for 2 days straight while wearing this product before I figured out it was the culprit. It looked like I was crying everywhere I went. I couldn't wear my contacts and had to switch to my glasses and that still didn't relieve the burning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve had horrible rosacea since Covid. I’ve seen countless dermatologists, but it was an expert make up artist who recommended this to me. Since foundation was my number one stressor for inflammation, I was hesitant. I was shocked to find that this CC cream doesn’t break my face out at all! If you’re on the fence, try it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Deep Mocha - very deep Complexion with cool red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This by far is the most hydrating cc cream I have purchased. The color matches perfectly with my tan. It does not feel cakey

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it and it’s part of my everyday routine. I used the oil free one before but I wanted something more light coverage as I don’t wear foundation and this is so nice and smooth on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Trying this was one of my worst decisions ever.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finish looks nice but if you have rosacea or eczema, stay far away from it. First day wasn't so bad, second day I was a little irritated but by the third morning, I looked like I was hit in the face with a softball. Now after Keflex and 4 different topicals, my skin has settled but my eye 7 vision may be permanently damaged from the flare up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the one product I never leave the house without, no matter what.  I live in Miami, where daily sunscreen is a must.  This cream protects, gives me natural-looking coverage with a healthy glow glow glow

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a light coverage foundation that didn't feel heavy on the skin and this is exactly it. Blends smoothly and is perfect for dry flakey skin, it gives a somewhat dewy glow after application. Scent is mild and faded quickly. This product did not sit in my creases like most foundations do. It also did not pill for me either, and I had applied a toner, serum and moisturizer before using it. Overall, this was exactly what my skin needed and I will be repurchasing it in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not great for the price. Coverage is ok but it pills bad, separated and defines dry spots. For the price I’d skip it and get something less expensive. I’ve used drugstore brand CCs that are far better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect all day wear! Love this cc cream so much. Great for everyday and lasts all day. It feels light on skin and buildable coverage. Also has a nice glow but not over the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! It’s like a glow from within, super skin like and very easy to blend. I recommend applying it in with your fingers! Sunscreen is a bonus to this!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for three months, I feel my skin is more hydrated. I love how the skin glows with the product on it. It's a little shiny but looks good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with this product and really confused by the bad reviews. I've seen some reviews mention that this shade light is too dark, but there are several shades lighter than this one. I am not fair, I am more of a light medium with warm tones, I have golden skin tone and this is the perfect shade for me so if you are fair then obviously it will not match. I am a 2N1 (winter) or 2W2 (summer) in Estee lauder double wear, for example, and this matches closer to my summer color of 2W2, which is considered a medium beige with warm undertones. I love how this gives my skin a nice glow and evens out my hyper pigmentation. It looks and feels like my skin but nicer. You will still need concealer for imperfections, I would say it is closer to a light coverage than a medium, but if you are going for a natural but better look, this is it!

reviews.review_title: Heavier than expected and oxidizes badly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a lightweight barely there base product, and this is not it. This is not a fault of the product, but the advertising is slightly misleading. It is much thicker than expected and feels heavy on my skin, and gives medium coverage. It does have a relatively natural finish, but it definitely looks like makeup.  The biggest fault with this product is that it oxidizes badly. I have a light neutral-warm skin tone (for reference, Estée Lauder Double Wear 2N1 and Maybelline FitMe 015 are near perfect matches), and at first, Light was a great match on my slightly tanned skin. After 6 months however it's now pulling orange and is unwearable.  For the price point, I really don't understand the hype around this product.

reviews.review_text: After spending 3 weeks in the South of France, I came home wanting to wear as little make up as possible. I went in deadset on getting the Ilia Super Serum Skin Tint but they were out of my shade so I picked this up on a whim and am so glad I did. It is lovely!  I apply it using my fingers and smooth it out with a damp beauty blender. The dewy/glowy finish lasts my entire work day and then some. I use a serum (Caudalie), eye cream (La Roche Posay) and day cream (Caudalie) underneath (and if I remember, I will also use a primer) and have had no issues with pilling. This is a beautiful CC cream and I will definitely continue to use it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Coverage is decent. Super oily and doesn’t really dry. The “glow” is more oil than “glow”. Need to cover with power if you don’t want to look like a glazed doughnut.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is a 10/10 product and my go-to. i wear this whenever i’m not trying to wear foundation but need to cover redness and scarring. it’s amazing, hydrating and decent coverage. love the consistency and love everything ab it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First time any tinted moisturizer or foundation has actually matched my skin tone. Love how light and smooth this is.

reviews.review_title: Colors are off, texture is just okay
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Whew, these shades. I love how many shades they have, but please buy this in store. Their “fair light” was closer to a light medium shade, way too dark for me. I thought I would go one shade lighter to fair ivory, but it’s also way too dark for me. My other foundation brands I am not a porcelain shade, but in this one I am I guess! The coverage is good, goes on mostly smooth with a little bit of settling in pores and fine lines. It’s nice after a good translucent setting powder on top. Not a total game changer for me, just okay.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am 42 almost 43 yrs old. I went into the store to get color matched, I am so glad I did cause trying to match this online would have been no bueno for me. I have dry skin and starting to show a bit of signs of aging (just a tiny bit, lol). This works great for me, it’s not heavy and it gives me medium coverage. You can layer it if you want to and it just gives you a glowy finish. Highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this, and so glad I got a shade lighter than I though. It matched me perfectly, but.. literally withn 2 hours it was sliding all over my face. I have normal skin, used to be oily but hasn't been in years, and this makes me soooo oily.  I've tried it with primer, without primer, with different moisturizers, etc. and I just can't get it to stay looking non greasy, Super disappointing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I almost never wear foundation because I find the color is usually off or it's too heavy. I've ever tried lots of other  bb/cc creams in the past and they either didn't provide enough coverage or the sunscreen didn't sit well on my skin.  This product has everything I want, it's buildable coverage, hydrating without making me look like I'm sweating, long lasting.   My skin is actually fair with pink undertones but this shade is perfect. I had someone at Sephora do a color match to help me find the perfect shade.   Very happy with this product!

reviews.review_title: Makeup Forever Y235 Dupe OLD Formula
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Hoping to save at least one person looking for a very specific shade match. My go-to foundation used to be the OLD formulation of the Makeup Forever HD foundation, but the company has since destroyed that product for me. I have been on THE HUNT for a Y235 dupe since the reformulation. This product in the shade Light is the closest I have come to a dupe! I am obsessed and so so happy to finally have a foundation again. Now I will say, the IT CC cream in Light is a darker version of Y235, but the undertones are a perfect match. I do one pump of the LA Girl white mixing pigment to get it to the perfect Y235 shade. Shade aside, the formula is stunning on my dry skin and it’s super easy to blend out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cc goes on smooth cover’s beautiful.And there is so many different shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a sample, used it and bought the full-size. I was looking for some medium coverage, and easy to apply. This lasts all day, and does not feel heavy. It applied easily. One amd a half squirts is all I need for my face.

reviews.review_title: Do not buy if sensitive skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is so flawless on the skin BUT long term this literally ruined my skin😫 I lost all hopes in it even clearing up its a bunch of small red bumps on my face caused by the insane amount of spf

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color match and coverage are great; finish is a little greasy long term, not terrible: but OMG the added sunscreen is HARSH. It has an overwhelming smell and makes my eyes start stinging within an hour of putting this on. After several hours of wear I'm running to wash my face to save my poor eyeballs. I do not experience this with comparably priced mid-market or premium CC creams/skin tints with added SPF. This is more like what I see with cheaper drugstore brands. I'm disappointed I can't love this after all the hype and think I will have to return it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I always wanted to use the original IT cosmetics CC cream because people raved about it but they didn't have a shade light enough for me. When this product came out and had a lighter option I was excited, and it didn't disappoint.  I have dry skin and typically prefer light coverage and this is my new everyday foundation.  It looks great, feels great, and evens my skin tone.  Just finished my first bottle and am repurchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Leaves my skin very hydrated and dewy while also giving a nice medium coverage. Definitely worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colour match was pretty good. I needed 2 layers to cover my skin, the first layer made me look more uneven than I naturally am. I looked like an oil slick after 4 hours. I was recommended this by the staff where I purchased this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who works from home, I don’t want to do a full face of makeup everyday, but still want to look and feel good. This provides just the right amount of light coverage and makes my skin feel great (usually I breakout if I wear heavy products multiple days in a row)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not it for me. I have well-balanced skin with the occasional redness/breakout. This actually makes my skin look like an oily mess. Powder helps to set it, but totally defeats the purpose of a glowy finish. Otherwise, it just slides around. I’m also allergic to something in it, as it makes my eyes puffy and watery. The shade  is perfect for me though.

reviews.review_title: Fair Light shade much darker than usual
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For some reason, the Nude Glow in Fair Light is much darker than the usual fair light shade in all the other formulations of IT’s CC creams. Something to watch out for! I certainly wouldn’t call this shade “Fair”. Other than that, I really enjoy this formula. It’s basically a tinted moisturizer— you won’t get much coverage from this, but it’s a nice moisturizing option if you have super dry skin or are just starting out with retinoids.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is glowy and beautiful it is a little expensive but it lasts a while I would definitely recommend this product to people it is natural with light to medium coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very light coverage and super oily on the skin.  I need to apply a power on after using it. p

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed. I’m loving my skin with this product. My skin is left feeling and looking hydrated with such a natural look/coverage. Super happy with my purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Colors are darker than in online. Also gets oxidation which turns out more darker during day. Plus, I had immediately pimples and red parts on my face after using this 2 times. Returning!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Tan - tan complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: was recommended this by an employee I'm not a big foundation girl and had no idea where to start. We were able to colour match to my summer skin. The texture is smooth and was easy to apply and blend with sponge. I topped it with a setting powder and felt so good with the colour and look. I'd recommend to those who perhaps use a drug store bb cream this is the upgrade with great skin benefits!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks like regular skin, I love it so much. The full coverage version was too much for me but this one is perfect for daily wear.
Great coverage. Travels easy.  A little too sparkly for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! I have combo skin, dry cheeks and a slightly oily t zone, This CC cream works great on both areas, giving me overall even tone and texture, The “glow” aspect gives your your skin the appearance of youthfulness, not shiny. I have received many compliments, such as “healthy, well rested, you look different” not that I look “made up”. I was recently in the store looking for a moisturizer and the beauty advisor was referring to the products in regard to age needs and said since I was in my early forties… I asked her to repeat that because I am in my early SIXTIES!! I do try to take good care of my skin, however I really have to give the IT Glow CC+ cream A LOT of the credit. I highly recommend this CC cream!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The most perfect light to medium coverage foundation I’ve ever tried. Evens out my skin tone without covering my freckles or making me look greasy. The perfect natural glowy finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I hate foundations but this is like a second skin. I love that my skin feels like I have nothing and it looks super glowy

reviews.review_title: Too dark (like a lot of reviews mentioned)
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Way too dark compared to old formula/bottle design. Undertone color is so different as well. I'd suggest going into a store to find your shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I used the shade finder to hopefully find my perfect shade. I entered 3 different brands and shades. Fair Light was the shade chosen for me but it is way too dark. I wear shade 3N in Charlotte Tillbury, Alabaster in Clinique and NW13 in MAC.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I first tried this as a sample, and I loved it enough to buy a full tube! I was loyal to my Bare Minerals Complexion Rescue for years (and I still like the product), but this stuff just looks more glowy and more even on my skin. The color light is wonderful for us fair olives, too. It really does just look like my skin but better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have combination skin, but this product doesn’t get absorbed and just makes me look sweaty and greasy. I have to add setting powder on top, and even then I’m afraid to touch my face during the day because it will smear off. However, I’m most disappointed in the color description, as the “cool rosy undertones” are quite yellow. I keep trying to use this product on an easy weekend day, but end up spending more time on my face trying to fix the mess. I’d only recommend this for dry skin, and only after testing the color in person.

reviews.review_title: I returned this it was so horrible! HATED THIS!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: HATED THIS! Slid off my skin! I usually always get compliments on my skin. I never actaully wear more than tinted spf for a full glam look, but this created texture. It was horrible! Will never buy again. RETURNED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I would give this 4.5 stars. Absolutely love the way it looks on my skin. It doesn't break me out and doesn't look cakey. I will say that I live in a very cold city and so it can stick to dry patches. Overall, would recommend for someone who is fair and has acne prone skin. SPF is also a HUGE plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation for a week now, and I love the light coverage and that glow! It's not shiny, but a healthy, natural glow. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the formula but I bough coverage for me. Very sheer. And a little greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had an allergic reaction to this product. Too bad because it looked pretty.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I accidentally bought this instead of the Your Skin but Better foundation and I’m happy I did. Both are great products, but I’ve been getting so many compliments since using this. I’m very happy with the purchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I hesitated to buy this CC cream because I haven't had any luck with the IT Cosmetics complexion line. But after seeing many Youtubers both my age and younger rave about it, I decided to try it. I wasn't expecting to like it, but this looks so pretty on my skin (more mature, enlarged pores) It was also not as shiny as I thought it would be and has really good longevity.  My only complaint is the shade range. I have to add a mixing medium to adjust the shade. But honestly,  it performs so well that I'm willing to tweak it; It's that good!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My skin loves this product! It gives great medium coverage that is buildable.
Amazing product! Love how smooth and flawless this makes my skin look. Feels natural and lightweight with full coverage. SPF is just a bonus!

Love this product. I’m a fan of their original CC and this offers less heavy coverage with more dewiness. Made me look too shiny in warm weather, but was perfect in cooler weather/winter for added radiance.

Love this product! I heard about the rave reviews and finally gave it a try. It has a little more coverage than my drugstore BB cream which was exactly what I was needing. Beautiful glowy finish and long wearing.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_text: I got a sample of this.  Like the product but not interested in any face products with SPF in them.  If I want to wear sunscreen I will wear it, not in my makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful CC Cream. Beautiful finish. Very buildable coverage and it just leaves your skin looking fresh and glowy. Keep in mind though that the shades oxidize to a half shade darker than what the swatch is online.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this brand ,was looking for a good coverage foundation for mature skin and it did the magic giving my face a nice healthy glow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Light - fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage was light but it did not feel light on my face. It was very moisturising but too moisturising for me. It felt a bit sticky and it made my face look like it was sweaty. Sweaty is definitely not the glow that I was looking for. I would not buy this one again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wearing Ilia for the past three years but received this as a sample and was knew it was time for a change. I originally bought this because of the travel-friendly packaging but my mind has been blown. The coverage is definitely medium (which is way more than Ilia) and the formula is lightweight (compared to ilia’s pretty thick oil feel). It is not sticky and doesn’t settle into fine lines but instead makes you look like a blurred, glowing goddess. Wore nicely all day without patching or turning into an oil slick. I even added a touch more after an 8 hour day so I could go to dinner and it melted in beautifully and layered well. 11/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula goes on lighter but emphasizes texture, yet the original formula goes on smoother but feels like a clay mask? Almost perfect, disappointed but for its benefits I’ll keep it. Happy about the extended shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used the original CC cream for years and loved it, but it was sold out in my shade so I picked this one up. I have combination skin and I tend be more dry in the winter months. I found this foundation to be way too oily for me, especially in the t-zone, even with a gripping base under and translucent powder on top. It was not a healthy glowy oily rather than a greasy oily. I would stay away from this product if you are afraid of looking too oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Immediately yes. Here are the pros: this is true to its description. It is lightweight, provides a glowy finish, pairs well with most moisturizers (avoid using with FAB ultra repair cream), and helps even out my skin tone. I do have very red cheeks, and I find this calms down the redness without creating a monochromatic mask. Additionally, I find the formula very moisturizing, which is perfect for winter. The best part is that this product is designed for lazy people such as myself. I apply it with my fingers, I don't have to worry about forgetting SPF, it's not high coverage enough to look patchy, and it stays dewey throughout the day. It's an essential part of my five-minute makeup, but can also be combined with cream or powder contour, blush, highlight without pilling or lifting.   My only notes are that this is best used with a setting spray, as the moisturizing formula is easy to remove by wiping your face with a tissue. It just helps it stay for the entire day. The second thing: I find this does make me break out more than usual, so I do like to give my skin a break for a few days and stick to concealer. This might be because sunscreens typically do cause breakouts for me, but the product is so convenient and pretty I use it anyway. I would prefer to have a breakout than forget sunscreen, which I inevitably do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this product and I’m not happy with how thick and cakey the coverage is for a “nude glow” product. It is emphasizing texture and not sitting nicely on my skin. I had tried the original CC cream previously and it was too high coverage for me. I expected better from this product but was disappointed and will return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC CREAM!!! I have extremely dry skin. However the coverage is more sheer. But it still goes on like butter!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It’s a good product - light coverage, my acne scars still show through, but it’s nice for when you want a natural look. The only issue I have with it is that it doesn’t sit well on top of sunscreen. I use the LRP anthelios sunceeen, and it separates on top of it, and pills off. If you don’t wear sunscreen it’s a good product. There is a slightly strong smell.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Color palette is excellent - very helpful for a good skin tone match. Light and comfortable to wear and also easy to remove. I prefer matte foundations and didn’t expect this to be so shiny. That’s the reason I gave it 4 stars. Would have been helpful to include this point in the product description

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is absolutely beautiful. It goes on smoothly and blends nicely; it blurs pores and evens skin tone. It wears really well. It isn’t too radiant — it just looks like skin. Perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A very elegant formulation. Perfect color match, dewy but not greasy finish, and an SPF that exceeds the minimum recommendation of 30. But why any cosmetic company in this day and age includes fragrance, much less such potentially irritating ones as linalool and limonene, in their products is beyond me. If you can smell it, and this one is strong, it's in there at a concentration that is likely to irritate skin. Get rid of it, and you've got a customer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted a foundation with SPF that was so lightweight my actual face still showed through, and this is it! I’m already a fan of the regular CC foundation but it just felt too full coverage for me for everyday. This is perfect! Though described as medium coverage I would say it’s more sheer than that. I use two pumps and apply with a brush and it’s enough for a lightweight glow that last all day (I also use primer and set it with powder).

reviews.review_title: Good if your short on time
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nice and light. Good for my busy mornings to help me feel put together for work. Nice glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Undertones are way off on my second tube and the product does not last very long. By the time I am at the end of the product it becomes very pilly and greasy. No longer buying this.

reviews.review_title: The answer is yes, buy this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup stays on beautifully all day and cleans off easily at night. My skin has fewer blemishes and is more evenly toned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love -Love It Cosmetics CC Nude Glow ! Great coverage that’s flattering for my 60 year old skin . I wish they made this formula without sunscreen , but that’s my only suggestion .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The undertones are so off. First I ordered warm tan…too ashy and neutral. I exchanged for tan. In these two, the undertones aren’t accurate. No yellow or golden undertones present. All ashy! Very disappointed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Beige - very fair complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For mature skin I absolutely love this product. I did however breakout and stop using, but was sad. After speaking with Sephora team I realized that I would need to double cleanse as it was the sunscreen in the formula. Easy fix, no more breakout and gives me a beautiful dewy finish. LOVE IT!!!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - light to medium complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very different than the original formula. It has a nice glow to it, but I found the coverage sheer. I also found that the coverage was not particularly long lasting. By the end of the day, it looked like I had nothing on.

reviews.review_title: Quickly becomes Greasy mess and does not last
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Doesn’t last long AT ALL!  I have dry skin but this got way too glowy almost greasy looking. Irritating when first applied probably due to fragrance. Just no. I’ll keep searching for a sheer casual foundation. .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is great for my skin. I selected the shade tan warm and it does match ok but it’s more neutral than yellow warm. I’ll do tan next time. The finish is smooth, hydrating, and glowy.

reviews.review_title: Great Everyday Foundation - My Go To!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My key points: light-weight, light-medium coverage, and hydrating. It takes 2 pumps to cover my entire face for a medium coverage and applies more watery than creamy. I love the natural glow it gives me but if it's too much, it's easy to fix with a powder on top. It lasts all day through sweating and stays on under my mask. Definitely colour corrects dark circles, redness, and uneven skin-tone. I wear this almost everyday.  Side note, I bought the OG formula years before I worked at Sephora and but the Nude Glow update continues to be my go-to!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - light to medium complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i just started with using more of this everyday easy make and This one it’s the third that I have tried and my favourite! it last and gives a nice glowing look! The smell can be a lil bit too much but

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this. I have tried a few foundations from it and this is my favourite one so far! It’s extremely light weight. It doesn’t provide much coverage which is exactly what I was looking for….So if you want some really light weight this is perfect.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light Medium - light to medium complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have loves every other foundation from this brand, so i was excited to give this a try. It did not live up to expectations. A lot more product was required for any coverage, and it left me feeling very oily. An utter disappointment   disappointment

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried loving this cc cream but it made my skin look so oily. I tried using it with a primer and applied setting spray, as well. But at the end of the day it melted into my skin and made me look really oily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got my usual shade category and it was SO dark and orangey! Also, I can’t stand the smell, which is kind of soapy? It’s just all wrong. I can’t see how it would wear the whole day and not be really oily. Returning.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used doublewear for years but was looking for a lighter-weight foundation for every day wear and I am super happy with this product! The color match is perfect, even better than doublewear. It feels like on my skin and with a little setting powder on top my oily skin stays under co tell. Would recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair - fair complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is definitely medium to light coverage, and very glowy. I have dry skin generally, though during the summer it is more combo, though never ever oily. This makes me look almost too glowy, But it doesn't hold up well and isn't breaking apart. It is the end of summer so i am thinking i am going to love this in winter when i am super dry. The original CC cream is absolutely amazing so i think i will use that in the summer and this in the winter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fair beige, not deep mocha.  I keep trying to get this to work cuz I’m angry that it’s not super cheap and I don’t want to give up on it, but I just can’t seem to hack it. I’ve used no primer, silicone primers, and water based primers (I will not buy their primer, I’m so over this brand). Anyways, it looks grainy and cakey no matter what tool I use to apply: brush, fingers, or sponge. It slides off my face despite setting powder and setting spray. I basically look like I am sweating profusely while playing beach volley ball and face planted in the sand. It’s awful. I’m starting to doubt my makeup skills. I thought I was halfway decent and kinda knew what I was doing but this stuff has broken me.

However, it feels a bit heavy on my oily skin and I have found it to not set well and move throughout the day. This could be because my skin is more on the oily side but it is still a great product if you want a subtle glow and medium coverage.

reviews.review_text: The swatches online are misleading. It's darker in person and turns orange on me. Also, I tend to look greasy with it after a few hours of wear. I think the formula is great but there's a lot that needs to be reworked, including the online accuracy of the swatches. I'm attaching a photo of the bottle IRL, it's way darker than the Swatch shown online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream is good. I was overwhelmed by the glow that it provides, but I just added powder on top to diffuse. Still wears great and looks like your skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this product on a whim and have been healthily addicted since. It comes with spf and the best part it makes me glow. I have a subtle youthful glow. I have discovered my new to go to and I wont give it up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Prior to Nude Glow, I used the 50spf It Cosmetics CC cream. The coverage was outstanding, but it always clogged my pores and made me break out. I read so many great reviews on the Nude Glow CC cream and decided to try it out thinking it would be better since it’s lightweight. Unfortunately, this one also makes me break out. I really was hoping it would work out for me. Aside from the break-outs, I do like the regular one most because there’s more coverage and it also seemed to last longer on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best CC creams that I've tried!! It provides a bit of coverage but still allows the skin to peek through. It gives off a wonderful glow and gives the skin the moisturized look. It definitely needs some type of setting powder though and especially over oily areas. It doesn't feel sticky or heavy at all and gives a no makeup makeup look. Definitely my new go to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am sure it's a great product but unfortunately, their color range is very limited. I am South-east Asian & the shade is either too dark or light for my skin tone.   I wish they had more shades to offer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So pretty !!!! Don’t think I’ll ever use another foundation :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the IT Cosmetics foundations, they're my holy grail products, but this one is my new favourite. The perfect amount of coverage, looks like my skin but better. It doesn't cake or crease, and my skin looks natural and dewy all day. I can't say enough good things about this one, and I appreciate the SPF.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is gorgeous on the skin! I have been using the original CC cream for years as my HG, and just made the switch to this. Shades are identical, the coverage is buildable and the glow is natural and beautiful. The one downside to this product is the amount you need. I use a beauty blender and needed to layer it around my T zone for more coverage, and I used two full pumps. Comparatively with the original, that would be one pump. But it truly gives that no-makeup look and that's exactly what I want.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the original CC+ foundation before and found it really heavy on the skin, this one does not have that problem! The finish looks natural and gives a slight glow. The SPF makes it perfect for summer, and the product does not feel heavy on my skin at all. Lasted all day, and did not cause any breakouts for me. I also found the shade range better in this than the original CC+!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The main ingredients, homosalate and octocrylene, have early evidence of disrupting your hormones and causing skin allergies. Look into them and make take that into account when choosing what you put on your skin. I wouldn't wear this everyday, personally. Ingredients aside, the coverage is fine. It evened our my skin tone but the consistency was off. It was patchy in some spots and looked like I had skin peeling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Like a moisturizer and slightly dewy.  I can smell the SPF and it is light and nice. My sensitive skin loves this foundation. The same shade (Fair Light) looks slightly different than same shade in matte version and I will include a photo. I would recommend it as it wears nicely throughout the day and doesn't separate or get oily for me. I've been enjoying it.

reviews.review_title: beautiful fresh coverage for daily wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the coverage and glow this product gives. I also tried the it cosmetics illumination variant which is also just as good. This is more fresh and light to medium coverage. Both definitely even skin tone, hide redness and dark spots. Its hydrating which the illumination variant did not have. Does not highlight pores or lines.

reviews.review_title: It's more light coverage than medium coverage.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually use a different foundation from IT Cosmetics, but when I saw they released this new Nude Glow foundation product I figured I had to give it a try. This shade is perfect for me. I'm a natural redhead with ridiculously white skin. You can see everything - redness, blue eye circles, and even some veins! I like using foundation to even out my skin tone and add some life to my face. The other foundation I use from IT doesn't come in a white enough shade and it's a little yellow-y in fact. Even though this new shade (fair-porcelain) is a good match, the foundation itself has rather faint coverage. It says medium coverage, but I'd actually rate this as light coverage personally (sort of like a tinted moisturizer). I also didn't really like it's blend-ability. I found this one to be a bit more streaky and residue-y than my other foundation. It was a good try and not a terrible product, but I think I'll return it and go back to my other foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I was worried it would be too light for me at first but it is PERFECT. I absolutely love everything about this CC cream. First of all, it has the perfect amount of coverage for summer and feels very lightweight on my face. I would say this product has light to medium coverage depending on how you apply it. I actually love using my hands with this product and it blends in wonderfully. It is NOT cakey or overwhelming. It does NOT crease under my eyes and it lasts all day. This is my new GO TO foundation. Plus you get SPF in it as well which makes it even better for hot summer days. I would 100% recommend this product to all my friends and family who are trying to find a new natural looking foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

It’s just enough to hide some pimples without the obvious makeup look. The SPF within it is great protection and the HA within it smells great and allows for a nice hydrated look. Overall, I highly recommend it as a tinted moisturizer with SPF rather than foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

I don't want the hassle of applying a CC cream with a brush or sponge, and this has a fair bit of coverage too. I sometimes will mix this with my regular sunscreen to make it more sheer and it applies beautifully like that too. Lasts all day, super dewy and natural finish, and love the tube packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

The description here says it has yellow undertones, however I am a neutral undertone and this is not yellow on me.  It has a great glow & just looks like nice, healthy skin. It doesn't have glitter.  I am really happy with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

There’s no cakeyness, and a little goes a long way. I also feel like the sheerness allows people like me, who become tanner in the summer to wear it then as well, as it blends into the skin. Overall my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best foundation I have tried! Blends in very easy and left my face looking glowy even after 10 hours of wear. I have dry combination skin and this product left my skin feeling so moisturized :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love, love, love this product. Gives my skin a lovely glow with a bit of coverage. Feels so light and hydrating.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin and this product looks amazing on,gives a glow all day and is super hydrating.A big fan of the medium coverage,covers blemishes but doesn’t feel like a mask like some full coverage foundations do.Only issue I have is the foundation tends to pill or streak if i apply it too soon after doing my normal skincare regimen.Other than that I love this,it’s my new go to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade match. Finish is stunning at first. If you're looking for something that lasts all day, this isn't it - I have other skin tints that last through a work day. After 2 or 3 hours, my skin ate it. If you just want something for quick, easy coverage for a few errands around town this is good, but not really beyond that. I have combo/dry skin and live in very humid/hot Texas...so maybe this isn't meant for my region and skin type??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Cakey finish and make me breakout with little white heads. Returned to the store after 2 uses

reviews.review_title: The perfect step down from their BB cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is exactly what I’ve been looking for. I’ve used the IT cosmetics BB cream for about a year now. I’ve always found the coverage a bit too much for my needs, a bit too thick for me. This item is the perfect light coverage I want for summer! I prefer something lighter on my skin that balances my tone. This is that perfect product!  It’s just like a tinted moisturizer and applied wonderfully. My skin feels light and I’m glowing

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using my IT cc+ nude glow CC cream. It has got everything that i needed for my skin. I use it in all the seasons whether it is summer or winter . Its has got SPF 40 and is perfect for me i usually reapply it after 3 hours if its too sunny and i happen to stay outside in sun for those many hours. Its so light on skin that no one can feel you have got something on face at the same time it makes your skin look clear and brightening. i have been using it since 2 months now and i will continue using it.  I highly recommend buying it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't have a product that I can compare the IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow to since I haven't tried a product like this before. I probably should have gone with a lighter shade than received because it was way too dark on me. However, I did notice the glow in it. Keeping this particular shade does not benefit me. I do plan to purchase a shade suited for me to determine whether this is a product I can add to my beauty routine or not. I didn't have any breakouts, skin irritation, or skin dryness so I would recommend it, but just make sure you pick a shade suited for you or the look you are going for.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this to blend with my usual foundation. It wasn't too heavy and worked perfectly to cover discoloration.

reviews.review_title: not for the dry skin girlies

reviews.review_text: I LOVED this when I tried it at the store then the first time I put it on myself it was horrible … I applied my usual spf & primer underneath then this & it clung to all my dry spots and looked so flaky. When I tried today with less dry skin, it looked fine but still a bit flaky around one dry spot. Other than that I love the finish and coverage but most likely will be returning bc I don’t need to look like my skin is shedding on days where my skin is drier.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Ivory - very fair complexion with warm yellow undertone

reviews.review_text: I really like this product! I think it has a much more lightweight coverage than some of my other medium foundations which is just fine because I don’t need/want a ton of coverage. You can still see some of my freckles and blemishes (chin area) on my skin in this photo. I was also worried about using a “Glow” formula on my oily skin and it’s staying power throughout the day but for me it only enhanced the glowy/dewy look. No filters/enhancements on this photo. I’m very blemish-prone on my chin so the niacinamide helps. Currently my go-to foundation for daily wear.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that it’s late wait and it does have a glow factor, but this definitely doesn’t last for more than two hours on my skin. After a couple hours of wearing the nude low foundation, I need to reply, and that means I need to rinse off my face and reapply it. Otherwise if you add make up on top of old make up, that doesn’t look good.  pro: glowing look  Con: only lasts 2 hours. Then fades away.   I’m definitely sticking with illumination foundation from a cosmetics!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Fair Porcelain - very fair complexion with neutral peach undertone

This isn’t super trendy or anything but I love that it has skin benefits and the texture is so nice, it feels like I’m just wearing moisturizer.   I would not have even tried this had it not been the points multiplier. I’m 30 and It cosmetics marketing always made me think that this was a brand for 50+ year olds. It’s a little spendy but for something that looks this good on, I’m willing to keep buying it. reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW!!!!!! first I'm the type of person that always does my morning/night skincare routine. I'm a huge SPF daily (and reapply throughout the day) person. I have sensitive skin with red/irritated acne. I wanted to try the new trend with tinted spf moisturizers, because I'm really not into foundation or concealer since my skin is so sensitive. I've been wanting to try this for a while now, and I desperately wish I did sooner! I first tried nars spf tinted moisturizer. did not like it! I do think it's nice for under make up for a full face if you have an all day/night thing. but unfortunately it was very drying. this CC+ cream has the great benefits of nars without being drying! goes on smoothly and blends in soooo well. and such a nice natural glow! it's so pretty. I have light brown skin (indian girl) so the neutral medium is perfect. I finally understand why it's always sold out. totally worth it! I love that it's not one of those super small and skinny bottles like other brands. while it's not a big value size, it's still a decent size for the amount you pay. this is perfect for those natural makeup look days, it's a nice primer that doesn't make your skin crazy dry. it's not super amazing coverage, but it does provide some coverage without being cakey/flakey like other products. I have dry skin so it's hard to find a product that doesn't dry it out even more. super impressed and will be buying these forever!

reviews.review_text: I followed the other reviews and went for a much lighter shade than I use in their original CC cream (I usually use Fair Light and opted for Fair Ivory). I will say that it is a COMPLETE 100% colour match to my skin tone (whereas Fair Light was a little dark for my winter skin), the coverage and longevity just aren’t there. As you can see in the unedited, unfiltered photos more of my flaws and freckles are poking through. This is even more prominent after 1-2 hours of wear. I was expecting light coverage so I was okay will slapping on some concealer to hide any tough spots. Initially the finish was quite beautiful, however it really starts to fade on the skin after only an hour or two of wear. I was much more impressed with the original formula. I might return this for a lighter shade in the original.   If you are okay with having more of a tinted moisturizer that you will need to reapply throughout the day, this isn’t too bad. However it does not hold a candle to the coverage and longevity of the original formula. Personally I will stick with that.

reviews.review_title: CC grey and Not worth it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Idk whats happening with brands lately, IT cosmetics was tried tested and true in every claim they made, but over past couple years since they changed the formula of the CC cream, they line is untrust worthy status in my book. This stick is not just a rip off, its a waste to buy. Coverage NONE, CC NONE, longevity NONE, Quality NONE, and PRICE not worth it at all.  CC part of this is the worse part, it changes on my skin, to more of a grey after 20 mins of application. Coverage non existent. If it had coverage the finish of the product is pretty, and skin looks hydrated, but the color messes it all up, and when I see the dark spots peaking thru under grey cast on the skin its very muddy and ugly. And above all the low SPF, why would u want that?

reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and finish of this product. It helps to enhance my features and cover up any imperfections without looking caked on. It made my skin super bright and glowy and it is perfect for everyday use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am moving to a very hot desert climate this summer, and wanted a product that I can sheer out or build up depending on my skin’s needs. I have very dry, flaky skin, so it was important to find a dewy/glowy product as matte foundations just dont work for me. I wanted it to be glowy enough that I don’t have to layer dewy products underneath to minimize sliding and stickiness. Another import factor for me was staying powder and the ability for it to dry on the skin while still being glowy. This ticks every single box. It is GORGEOUS on my skin, not so dewy that it emphasizes texture or bumps but imparts a perfect glow. I can layer this depending on my coverage needs, and I don’t have to go in with a very sticky dewy primer. This also stays put on my skin with or without powder, and doesn’t feel heavy (an issue I run into with alot of glowy products). It blends in like a dream and plays well with my cream and powder products. I found the CC Cream from IT to be too heavy and caky on my skin, so I was reticent to try this, but went and picked it up after finishing my sample. My new staple summer base product for sure! Medium Tan works well for me, and I have a medium skin color with a warm olive undertone. If you’ve had issues with other glowy prodcuts being too heavy or slipping on your skin, give this one a try! I absolutely love it. So natural looking and gives a true glass skin effect without being greasy. I prep with Tatcha Dewy skin cream and set with a little bit of Charlotte Tilbury pressed powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the it Cosmetics CC+ Nude Glow skin tint in the shade light and, unfortunately, as you can from the swatch on my wrist, the shade seemed too dark to be classified as light. This seems more medium for me, so for those with light or fair skin, I would consider using a lighter shade than you would usually choose. Using this glow tint made me look substantially tanner but helped even out red spots in my complexion. As far as performance, the Nude Glow skin tint was very pigmented and evened out my complexion but gave little coverage, so I would state it was light coverage more than medium coverage. It did tone down some of my red spots and I appreciated that. Two things I really love about the product is that it is SPF 40 and that it has skincare benefits. Between a product with skin benefits and built in sun protection and a product without these, I am more apt to reach for product with these attributes. I do wish the sunscreen smell was a little more faint. If you are sensitive to smells, there is a sunscreen smell definitely present with this product, however it fades quickly. Overall, I do believe it provides that your skin but better look as it states on the package and I like that is evens out my complexion, provide sun protections, and skincare in skin tint.

I'll be returning this and unfortunately I'll have to switch to a different brand of foundation since they are not restocking the Illuminating CC in Fair.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a newbie to using It Cosmetics, but after using the CC+ Nude Glow I understand the hype. My skin has been going through a dry spell, and the products I normally use have left my makeup looking patchy and flakey. The Nude Glow formula has been a lifesaver, leaving me with a smooth, glowing base layer. The coverage is sheer-medium depending on how you apply it, but I like that it is buildable and customizable to my needs that day. I like to use for a ‘my skin but better’ kind of look. Bonus points—the SPF 40 is amazing. I actually have a form of sun allergy and have been looking for the perfect SPF product to use on my face and this is it! It doesn’t break me out or leave me with an awful sunscreen smell. The only small con I have for the product is that it can feel kind of tacky on the skin if you don’t set it, but it hasn’t been an issue for me as I always use setting powder. I highly recommend the CC+ Nude Glow especially for the upcoming warmer months, I am now an It Cosmetics fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I don't even know where to start! This is one of the best foundations I've ever used. First the shade, being mixed race, I'm not dark or light but in some brands, I have to go on the darker side and others I have to get lighter shades. When in doubt, I go with a medium tan/light, it gives me a good idea if I need to go darker or lighter. This shade was spot on!! It blended perfectly! It covered scars and imperfections with just one layer. So perfect shade, perfect coverage! Other brands I've used, certain spots start to cake or rub off by the end of the day...not with this one. It stays on all day and night, no caring at all! If I have to say one negative, is the price..its a bit overpriced for my budget but I would definitely splurge when I could. I highly recommend!  *I received this for free. I am not being paid for my review by any means.*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: glowy skin of my summer dreams!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: i found the foundation i’ve been looking for!   i live in socal, and as a socal girl, i’ve been wanting to embrace my surroundings and have more glowy/summer make up for my look. however, a lot of my current foundations are matte, because i have oily skin. usually, it’s difficult for me to get a glowy look through makeup, because i’m so oily all the time.   i struck gold with this foundation, because it gives me a summer glow, but doesn’t slide off my face. score!   additionally, i love that this foundation doesn’t oxidize on me AND it has buildable coverage. i’m not a fan of full coverage foundations and it’s hard to find light-medium coverages that work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love how this makes my skin look! Covers what I need it to but also gives the clear skin look. Looking forward to using this in summer! Only reason I didn’t give this 5 stars is I don’t notice it lasts a full day. Could also need a better primer tho!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Soooo good. Just gives your skin a healthy look and not heavy at all. Feels so nice when applying I think this is my holy grail and has replaced the original cc cream

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely an all in one product. It leaves the skin looking fresh and glowy. The colors are also flexible because I received this color but I am darker than the model and it worked fine. I had to use powder because I have oily skin and I don't want to look too glowy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has used the illumination CC cream, I was excited to try this new product. It holds up to the IT Cosmetics quality and is a nice addition to their line. As always, the pump makes application easy with a beauty blender or even your fingers.  I like the consistency of the Nude Glow skin tint. It feels super light on the skin and gives just enough coverage for a natural look. The other CC creams can tend to be too thick, and I think this is a perfect balance. For my review, I was provided with the shade “light,” which is a bit too dark for my pale complexion. In the right shade, I think the IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow Light is an ideal summer foundation. I would recommend it to friends looking for a multi-benefit skin tint that offers natural coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry 48 year old skin. ILove it. I cannot mess it up. Tried with different sunscreens and primers and it always looks good. Doesn’t settle into lines. A true medium coverage. The only thing I don’t like it that the chemical sunscreen makes my eyes burn so I have to keep it away from my eyes. I wish they would leave the fragrance out as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product - the original CC was one of my favorite base products of all time when I started getting into makeup. It lasts really well and has a really solid amount of coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good stuff. I like a medium (or light) coverage when it comes to complexion products and I’m definitely a “glow” fan. This is my favorite of the It CC creams. Great color match for my skin tone. Doesn’t change colors as it settles. Your skin but better.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am just loving this CC it has such a beautiful natural finish but at the same time just brightens my face. The application is easy pumping on to a blender. I personally apply mousturizer and then this and everything glides over my skin despite having blemishes. It provides a nice amount of coverage and has never caked on me. I have also applied it on it own and it doesn't go into my pores lime other cc have done before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
