It does have a fine shimmer to it so there’s absolutely a “glow”. I think it’s great for a quick touch up before leaving the house but don’t expect to cover any real blemishes with this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was sure to clean and dry my face prior to applying.  Once applied, it felt like it never really dried.  I was totally uncomfortable with it on.  It was not a good match for my skin type maybe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone

My favorite thing about this is that while it gives you some coverage it's not so heavy that it just erases the natural contours of your face, so I don't find the need to add any blush or bronzer, and definitely no need for highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage of this foundation! It looks like my skin but 1000 times better! It feels so light on my skin but covers all my flaws and gives me an amazing glow. It looks like I just had 10 hours of sleep and I slept sooo good!! I would definitely recommend this foundation if you like a glow with your foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon first use with this product I fell in love. This makes my skin feel so smooth and moisturized. One of the main things I love is how lightweight it feels. It literally feels so light like I didn't put anything on. And the glow it left was amazing. I will definitely be using this product again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the glow from this. This foundation is so lightweight, I forgot that I had it on. And since my skin is kind of good, a little went a long way for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Goes on nice has kind of a chemically orange smell which I don’t mind. If you don’t love the glow every day you can layer with powder. I’m only a couple days in but wears nice so far. I’m glad I went in store to color match as I’m mixed race and actually color matched to light which in reality is a light buff beige. I generally wear a shade or two below a medium so I’m happy I went in to test the shades before purchasing online (didn’t have this exact product in my local store). SPF is nice as we meander toward summer. So far so good. I don’t know about any of these serum claims. Just provides a nice glow without being slick or shiny.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Truly a beautiful cc cream. this blurs your skin to perfection and gives you the most beautiful glow. it is lightweight and extremely hydrating on the skin. and believe it or not it's extremely long wearing. it looks just as good at the end of the day as when you initially applied it once you blot your oils away. 100% recommend

reviews.review_title: Pretty dark for a light color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't receive a good color match, as I am far too fair skinned for what I did receive Light. I decided to give it a go anyway. The first time I wore it, I noticed that it worked really hard at adjusting to my skin tone. The formula lightened up and even though my face was darker than needed to be, it wasn't as dark as the CC skin tint was right out of the bottle. I then started to use it with a heavy facial moisturizer and my light foundation that I already had on hand. After a few attempts, I think I actually made a good match for me. I'm happy to use the remainder of the product, but will always need to lighten it prior to application. I love the bottle and the formula in general. Very easy to apply and the coverage is just what I was looking for. Nothing too heavy or oily. I like the more natural look, but still have a few problem areas that I like to cover. This CC+ skin tint works very well for all of my skin needs. When ordering, I will make sure to get a lighter tint, as the Light one was more like a medium tint in my opinion. Cute container and overall was a joy to try.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone

reviews.review_text: My sister recommends that It cosmetics cc cream until haven't believed I am gonna use that on daily basis. reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The IT COSMETICS CC NUDE GLOW FOUNDATION has now become my favorite IT Cosmetic product by far. I love how they expanded the shade range for this line and now I am able to find a shade that better matches to my skin (their shade range was literally the reason that stopped me from using their CC creams in the past). reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

This is the best CC I've ever tried and I will definitely purchase again. If you want a  nice glow, natural looking coverage and spf then this is the formula for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC Nude Glow! I’ve been really into cc creams lately with being a mom on the go and this is seriously perfect for the days that I want makeup on, but don’t have the time to do a full face! It feels so light on and has a beautiful glowy finish. I would say it has medium coverage but you can definitely build it up if you need more! Overall, I highly recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lays beautifully on the skin. Gives a beautiful glow.  My go-to for the summer now

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - medium complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used the regular It Cosmetics CC cream but I love this glow one. It just adds that extra pop my skin needs. I have regular skin that can sometimes be on the drier side. The color I received (medium) was a tad bit too dark for me, but it will be perfect when I have a tan during the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I really like this serum. Not so much to give a 5 star, because I don't know it it acts long wear but so far, it does what it says. It does color correct, I even put a side by side comparison of my green veins and scab on my wrist to show the difference on just how well it covers. I would say it's medium to almost full coverage. I also enjoy the fact that it's an spf foundation as here in Arizona, it's starting to get a little hotter and my tan is becoming more full circle. So sun protection is a must .. and it does leave a glow, finish also makes my skin look like skin & is very moisturizing. 4/5 rating and thank you Bzzagent for sending my way just in time for when I was searching for my next foundation .

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I really enjoyed this using this foundation/sunscreen. I guess you could call it a BB cream. I thought the coverage was nice in that it matched my skin tone more or less and it felt like a sunscreen. However the only thing that bothered me about it was that it was heavy - might be because I am used to wearing very lightweight foundations and concealers. It also might be because there is a sunscreen component to it.   Looking back, I would probably get a lighter shade, but I would definitely use it again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a beautiful finish! It’s very radiant without appearing sparkly. I love the skincare benefits that come with it. I will absolutely be wearing this all throughout the summer!

reviews.review_title: a new staple in my bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried a sample once of the It Cosmetics CC Cream when it first came out and I loved the coverage and lightweight feel but felt I needed a bit more moisture and dew so when the It Cosmetics Illumination came out, I instantly bought it. I was severely disappointed with that one due to the excessive amount of glitter in the product and, since then, I've just kind of written off these CC Creams and chalked it up to them just not working for me. But THEN when I saw they came out with a CC Cream Nude Glow, I knew I had to try it. The product was already on my radar when I got offered a free sample in exchange for an honest review and I couldn't have been more stoked. I tested it the day it came in the mail and I am HOOKED. This is exactly what I wanted from the original CC Cream. It's got amazing coverage, but it isn't heavy at all and leaves my skin so hydrated, both while wearing it and afterward. It is super dewy and glowy and perfect for someone like me with skin more on the dry side. This is seriously my perfect product and it will be a new staple in my makeup bag. I'm so so SO happy they finally made a version that works better for dry and dull skin.   Also, I know this review was extremely long-winded haha, but I thought it was important to note that I've literally tried all of their versions of the CC Cream and why this one works for me, but the others didn't. Just in case you're in the same boat or are hesitant if another version didn't work for you. This is seriously AMAZINGGGGGGG.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics Nude Glow Neutral Rich formula is of medium thickness and goes on thin. The coverage is medium and is perfect for a natural or light glam look. There is a nigh glow to the foundation that makes it look more polished. I used it on my oily skin and it worked well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. This one has a bunch of shades to choose from, which is great compared to other products I've tried in the past where my brown skin tone was either too light or too dark and I would end up mixing in some foundation to get my color. With this product I have my color out of the tube.   It feels great going on and smells great also. This is a great, lightweight product. It evens out my light redness around my nose and definitely gives a glow. It feels more like moisturizer than foundation and doesn't look or feel caked on. I really like using a damp sponge to apply this. It has definitely become my new go-to product, but I would recommend setting it with powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you don't like the scent of sunscreen, you won't like this CC cream. Though it claims 40 SPF, I still wear sunscreen underneath because I can't cake on enough to get that claimed SPF coverage. When applying, I use about 3 pumps to cover my face in a single layer and the color medium is just slightly dark for me at the moment, but I'm sure as it gets warmer outside it will be just fine. There is a definite sheen once applied, which isn't necessarily my goal but it isn't overpowering. The color correcting is great and calms my rosy cheeks nicely. Likewise, the light to medium coverage smooths my skin decently. Since my skin is combination, I would probably avoid wearing this CC cream on very hot (sweaty) days as the formula is slightly heavy. Overall it is a decent CC cream, but I do think the price is a bit up there.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for the warm months ahead! Light weight, great coverage and formula, and benefits for your skin!

reviews.review_title: Smooth Finish Like a Second Skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how light and creamy this formula is. It isn't heavy like foundation. In fact, I couldn't really feel it on my face at all. It just felt like a second skin, which I loved because I live in a very hot and humid climate most of the year. The coverage was also pretty good. I did still feel like I needed a concealer on top for better under-eye coverage.   I have combination skin that is quite oily in my T-zone area. The first time I applied the CC cream, I tried it alone all day so I could see how it would respond on its own. I only added concealer under my eyes for better coverage of my dark circles. Within 90 minutes, my face was dewy all over. Within 3 hours, I had to pat down my face to minimize the excessive shine.   As a result, the next time I applied the CC cream, I set it with powder. It performed much better! I still had some dewiness that appeared around the 3-4 hour mark, but not as much as before.   So, if you have combination or oily skin, you definitely need to pair this with a powder (to minimize shine) and a setting spray (for full-day wear).  All in all, I really like this product and the lightness of the formula, especially during summer when full-face makeup in a 90-100+ humidity environment makes me cringe. This will definitely be my go-to for the warmer months, especially since it has SPF added.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great CC product. I love IT cosmetics overall and this blend is great. I love the SPF in the product and the coverage this gives. I would recommend it. The medium is much darker than I expected but I will be able to use in more in the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite skin coverage product! Goes on completely smooth with a perfect natural blend. Makes my skin flawless with a natural tan tone! Went on easy, super smooth, not greasy as all and with a nice light scent. Absolutely in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for foundation with SPF for some time now and this product definitely gives me what I need. It keeps my skin hydrated and the texture is smooth without looking cakey. I love this product, but the color I received was too dark for my skin tone. My only disappointment is that they do not carry a wider spectrum of colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this CC cream. It blends seamlessly into my skin. It doesn't feel like it clogs my pores. In fact, it makes my skin glow since it also acts as a brightening serum. I also appreciate the fact that it is SPF 40, which is a big plus as I don't have to layer on anything else on hot and/or humid days. My skin looks and feels a lot better since I began to use this, and I love how it makes my complexion look. Absolutely recommend others to try it out as well!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a light to medium coverage foundation that’s buildable this is it! Great texture

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy smokes, IT Cosmetics knows how a make a CC cream. The CC Nude Glow gives me a flawless, yet natural looking, dewy finish. And the buildable coverage is amazing. I absolutely love this stuff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I’ve used a different version of this product in the past and loved it! I got a full size version of this complimentary to fry and review and I love it just as much as the original! The shade I received was a shade or two too dark for my skin but I definitely purchase the right shade in the future.   The formula is lot thicker than most bottled foundations but it’s spreads evenly and easily with a kabuki brush and is a medium to full coverage product + SPF which is the biggest turn on for me!  Not a huge fan of the finish, it’s a luminous/dewy finish which leaves my combination skin looking somewhat greasy if I don’t use a finishing powder.

Undertone of foundation is slightly off but can be adjusted with other products. All in all workable for short days on oily combo skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really using this cc cream. The scent of sunscreen wasnt too heavy and provided some coverage as well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - medium complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always wanted to try IT cosmetics CC cream. I’ve heard amazing things though, all the claims seemed too good to true.   I’m here to say that not only does this product even out my skin tone, provide a great amount of coverage without being “cakey” it also looks natural enough and gives me a nice dewy look. I always wanted to find a product that gave me enough coverage but also a radiance to my skin. I finally found it and am so grateful because I was able to sample it through a review campaign!   The application was super easy- it blended right into my skin!   After initial application, my skin looked flawless and I was stunned with the results. Towards the end of the day, I was pretty impressed at how my skin looked still though, my acne scars were coming through.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of IT Cosmetics Nude Glow Skin Tint. This product is better for me than full coverage liquid foundation I wear, especially where I live because the weather is hot during the Summer and that can cause a problem if I'm outside and start to perspire and need to blot my face. This CC+ Nude Glow feels lighter, since it is a medium coverage tint and as a plus it also contains a serum and a SPF level 40 sunscreen.  When I applied it I used my finger, but there's also a tip on the box that says you can build the nude glow up by applying 1 to 2 pumps by using a brush.  The IT CC+ Nude Glow skin tint comes in a slim, lovely shimmering box. But the tint itself is in a tube that's 1.08 fl. oz., which is a good size, yet small enough to toss in your purse or bag to travel with. I feel confident carrying it in my purse without worrying about spills because the top stays put until you pull it up to remove it and you must push down on the pump to get it out the tube.    I like how fast, smooth and easy it was to apply and the way it gave my skin just enough color and coverage without looking heavy. It's also great for those times you just need a subtle change to your natural look and want to quickly get out the door, while also giving your skin protection from the sun's UVA/UVB rays! I would definitely keep this on hand and pass the news on to family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for the summer. Great coverage and wears beautifully throughout the day. My fave method to apply is with my beauty blender. I wear shade Medium, 3 in One Size BB Cream, 7 Neutral in CT Beautiful Skin Foundation, NC35 in Mac, 2Y20 in MUFE HD Skin Foundation. If your face looks cakey or feels heavy, you are using too much. Remember, 2 thin layers is better than 1 thick layer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

I don't wear foundation or anything heavy, but I've found that CC creams give me a little bit of coverage for uneven or dark spots without feeling like I'm caking on makeup. With that being said, this CC cream felt terrible on my skin. It felt heavy, didn't apply smoothly, and within an hour looked uneven and became splotchy. It gave my pores a weird look as well. The only thing I liked about this was that it matched my skin color. But otherwise, it felt like a really cheap, terrible formula. I tried it multiple times using different methods: straight onto my skin, over primer, over moisturizer, over serums... you name it, I tried it. And it sucks every single time. I eventually tossed it. Oh well. You win some; you lose some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried this product several times with different primers, conditioners and application methods. The color does not match. Tan rich is does not match enough shades to be touted as a color. Every single time I use it, gray undertones. Never fails. It does provide coverage of dark spots and uneven skin tone. If it matched my color at all, it would be amazing. I received a free sample in exchange for my review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been a fan of the It CC+ creams for ages and this was the only one I hadn’t tried. I am incredibly impressed. The finish is glowy but still natural and it doesn’t look cakey even after wearing it for hours. Coverage is medium to full and is buildable. A little goes a long way. It lasts all day and still looks good. The finish of this product is what I love the most. Within the first few hours of wearing this, I had already recommended this to friends and family.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream has a healthy, glowy finish, and works well to cover some of the redness on my face without being heavy. Coverage is light to medium and somewhat buildable. As someone with tan skin, I appreciate the fact that the spf doesnt leave a white cast! Overall, this is a perfect foundation if you want a youthful, glowing look and dont need much coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC Cream from IT Cosmetics. Easy to apply, with an amazing lightweight buildable coverage. My skin doesn't feel heavy with this Cc cream. The glow this adds to my skin is beautiful!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture and feel of cc nude glow. However the color was little off for me a bit too pink in color for a tan/ rich I normally use the CC illumination cream  in rich and thought this would be a nice softer swap out from time to time but other than the skincare benefits which I love I’m not sure I’d make it a staple.  I may just try the rich shade which appeared too dark initially.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This cc cream was great! It’s makes your skin look perfect and it’s not heavy. Goes on easily with whatever tool you use including your hands. Gives your skin a fresh understated glow! Probably not my go to but still very good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this a lot! It seems kind of thick out of the tube but it spreads evenly and easily. I used a damp beauty sponge to pick it up from my hand and apply on my face and it worked really well. Can be worn she or built up to a medium coverage. Has a slightly glowy finish after applying but nothing crazy so the finish is more versatile. I didn't set it with powder so I got quite a bit of shine as the day went on so I mostly took off a star for that otherwise it's great! I received mine in the color light which looked too dark and warm for me (I'm a light/fair cool toned person with a lot of pink rosy tones) but since it sheers out, it looked like a very natural, very slight tan so this may be my spring + summer go to! Overall I'm impressed and I'll be looking into buying a tube once I use this up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cc cream. Has solid medium coverage and doesn’t feel heavy. Even with oily skin the glow in this doesn’t make me look greasy. I would still recommend setting with a little powder. Spf makes it a great day option and the color match is great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of It Cosmetics CC Nude Glow in Medium Tan. I felt like I should have went a shade darker for a better match. It CC+Nude Glow has a pleasant scent. This foundation caused a mild reaction. My skin felt itchy when I applied it especially around my eyes. This foundation didn't play well with my other cosmetics though. I applied with a foundation brush and it went on smoothly and didn't settle into lines or pores. But I didn't care much for how it felt once applied. It felt almost sticky but I remedied that with setting powder. Overall, if I hadn't had a reaction to this foundation I would be purchasing another one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors swatches in the pictures are not accurate and the medium was way too dark to wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I spend a lot of my time out under the sun so foundation with SPF in it is a must for me. I like to wear a light layer of makeup so this It Cosmetics CC Nude Glow lightweight foundation sounded like the perfect fit. I have been truly impressed with this product! It feels light on the face, it's extremely easy to blend, and the foundation is buildable. It's great for everyday wear - but it does feel a little bit tacky and I believe that's due to the sunscreen in it. I set it with some powder and have no issues. Overall, this foundation gives me an even complexion with a light glow and wears beautifully. I will absolutely be purchasing this again and I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_title: Dewy skin that feels good and looks natural!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this foundation because it is light and doesn’t feel heavy. It has a dewy finish on my skin and covers enough so I don’t have to layer it on. Great product as we head into warmer weather!

reviews.review_text: This product was lovely and I received many compliments. I felt that it blended nicely. However, it made me break out terribly! So I was pretty bummed out about that.

reviews.review_text: Great, lightweight foundation! So soft on my skin and makes my skin look soft and hydrated

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this! I get the hype now. I’ve never used the regular one but I’ve used the illumination one and it had little specks of glitter. This one just has an amazing glow! It’s got a great coverage and I love the skincare benefits!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Literally in love ! I've never used a foundation with a more beautiful & perfect finish & comfort ! It feels like you're not wearing anything ! Plus it has spf 40, so it's protecting your skin while also making it look like it's best self !! Very long lasting too! My skin looked just as beautiful at the end of the night as it did at the beginning!! I am highly recommending!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow Medium. It goes on smooth and evenly with a brush. It doesn't dry out my skin or look caked on. It also has nice coverage that isn't too little or too much. I definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how smooth it is and the coverage.  What happened put so much

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the hydrating glow this product has And the coverage. Feels like but still covers all my imperfections

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a great product! Solid medium coverage and beautiful glowy finish. Consistency is very similar to the brand’s original CC foundation just slightly more liquid. I love that it has good ingredients and spf although I still wear a true spf underneath. It does have a fragrance that smells nice but slightly like sunscreen. Overall this is a great product and I would definitely repurchase!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - medium complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing!’ Made my skin glow and gave it great coverage!! I didn’t like the spf smell but I can live with it. Definitely recommend it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: WOW! I’m always on the hunt for my perfect foundation. With my mid 30s maturing dry skin, most foundations that are highly rated on here just didn’t blow me away… I always ended up having dry patches or it looking too much like makeup. I’ve tried the OG CC cream (I prefer the illuminate) and it’s good too but still doesn’t receive my full stamp of approval. THIS ONE is INCREDIBLE! This really looks like skin on me and the glow is SO youthful! This has jumped up to my top of my must haves sitting right next to my holy grail NARS Longwear radiant foundation. This one will be my everyday wear and NARS will be special occasions and events.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed using this make up from IT Cosmetics. It is super creamy, blends in smoothly. I like that I don't need powder or anything to get a natural matte look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didn’t expect to love this, and yet here I am! It’s perfect for when I want more coverage than my Elta MD tinted spf, but don’t want the full coverage of foundation. Goes on beautifully and gives your skin a really healthy glow, not shimmery or shiny. Bought it on a whim during the rouge sale, so happy I did!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this just a few times I feel like I have seen my under eye area become lighter! Also I love the light coverage this provides which makes me look and feel like I have on very little makeup. I will say the pigment payoff could be higher for a little to go a long way so to speak,  but the formula is so buttery I would still happily wear it daily. It isn’t super long lasting either so for a night out I would likely opt for something heavier, but it’s a great light choice for day looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Why are you missing medium ? It exists on the colour swatches photos AND can be chosen on the actual It website. The captions on some of the new items haven't been labelled (see Charlotte tilbury eyeshadows) and now this, you're missing the most common shade of a product?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This CC cream is amazing! It provides buildable coverage and spf protection! Love that it last for a long time woth no reapply necessary! Greay skinatch and very light weight product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great for contouring I haven't had any flashbacks it has been settling nicely under my setting powder I feel works better than spray and there hasn't been any any odor I do Wish that there was more of a variety of colors I could turn it into a light bb cream but I'm happy!  I received this product free for my unbiased honest opinion.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love CC cream, BUT the majority of the time I am left with an oxidized, sticky, and oily complexion just a few hours after application. This CC Cream left me looking radiant with a “like skin” but better feel. I enjoyed that the CC cream works as a medium to full coverage foundation that can be worn alone or with other makeup. Also, SPF!!! I took off one star for the packaging, I noticed that the nozzle gets clogged and the metallic finish on the bottle wore off quickly while sitting in my makeup bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful tinted moisturizer! It is very lightweight yet has good coverage. It feels like nothing on my skin! I’m quite oily and had a little glow by the end of the day but no oil breakthrough — color me impressed! I found this wore best when used somewhat along the lines of an actual moisturizer—no primer and don’t over-moisturize your skin beforehand. I did notice it slipping when I tried either. This is going to be my perfect summer foundation!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Rich - tan to deep complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the your skin but better mantra and this product mixes skincare into a makeup routine beautifully. Even on those mornings where I don't have much time, popping this on, along with doing the eyebrows has me ready for the day. It's definitely medium coverage so it doesn't cover acne scars, but it does make them less noticeable. The one huge drawback for me is slight cast on my face when using the product. It's either the sunscreen or the tint being too light or not being the correct undertone, but it made me look ghostly so I didn't like that part. I'll have to experiment with some of the other shades to see if I can find my match, but as a whole, it felt very weightless and I loved the finish of it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to give my opinion, it is a great product to use daily on my combination skin, it works very well, it helps me to give some coverage to my face and at the same time protects me from the sun which is perfect , it feels light on the skin and although it has a little fragrance it is tolerable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to test and was so sad that the shade did not work for me however, it was a perfect match for my sister!   It looks great on her and is not heavy, sticky or heavily scented. She said it takes a few minutes to set/color correct but it worked very well. It hid some of her discoloration and looked very natural. I was pretty jealous that it worked so well for her!  She loved having the SPF and foundation mixed as it eliminates a step in the process!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lightweight with the coverage of a foundation. Loved the way it blended out with my skin. However it didn’t leave my skin feeling like I had a heavy foundation on. Perfect for the impending summer months ahead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looks super natural and it has SPF which is so important it feels like a second skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging on the product is very elegant. It applies smoothly and evenly. The shade I tried was a little too dark for my complexion but that isn’t their fault. It does have a slight sunscreen smell to it but overall I would recommend this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy this blends into my skin. The medium coverage is everything. I feel like this works great with a primer. However if you don't use a primer that moisturizes and you have dry skin, it may dry you out. I also adore the way my skin feels while wearing it. This is a must have especially since it doesn't have parabens and it's SPF 40. This would most likely be a great Summer foundation to wear when it's warmer weather or it would just be good for people with oily skin more than dry skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow, wow, WOW! This is one amazing product. I wish I could give it 10 stars!   Let me first start by saying… it’s absolutely refreshing to find a skin tint like this which perfectly matches my shade (being a woman of color), moisturizes my skin, AND includes SPF 40 sunscreen. I’ve looked for something similar before to use during the hot summer months here in Las Vegas. The one other product I’ve tried made me look like a ghost! It was borderline embarrassing how quickly I wasted my money on that one.   And then, out of nowhere, I’m chosen to receive this gem from It Cosmetics - the CC+ Nude Glow in Neutral Rich. I love that it has green tea extract in it. It’s medium coverage which is ideal in the heat. It goes on so smoothly, applying it is a dream. The instructions say to reapply every 2 hours as needed but that wasn’t necessary. It lasted all afternoon this past weekend while at a birthday party/BBQ at the park in 85+ degree weather. It’s light but I still feel like my skin is being properly protected from the sun… which is awesome! Women of color can and do get sunburn, especially on our faces.  I’ll admit that the price point is a bit higher than I’d normally spend on such a product, however, I WILL gladly spend more money for better quality and longevity. I would most definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the original CC cream before and while it was ok, I didn't end up using it much because it left me a bit dry and patchy. It just felt a bit too heavy and the light shade wasn't  quite right for my skin tone. I did love that it had SPF in it and when this glowy version arrived, I had to try it. The shade range is much better and the fair beige shade is a pretty good match for me. It goes on smoothly and seems to cover my red patches well enough, though it certainly isn't a full coverage foundation - and that's ok with me. It is very glowy and fresh, and maybe a tad too much for my taste, so I did set my t-zone with a touch of powder and the final effect was very nice. I love that it has SPF in it, yet it doesn't feel heavy at all. I think this will be my go-to foundation for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the idea of spf, makeup, and skincare. It’s basically all I could ask for. I brought this with me on a trip to the tropics and I loved it! It was the perfect easy routine in the morning for a relaxed beach dAy. I’m sure sure it’s reef safe so I didn’t wear it in the ocean but for any other sun activities it was perfect. Also it wasn’t sticky or over done which can be a bad look when it’s hot and sweaty.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - tan complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be my new favorite it cosmetics product. i like that their products have a good level of spf but some of them either i cannot get a good color match, break me out, or are now discontinued. I sometimes use the cc+ illumination and my confidence in a compact is no longer available. For the cc+ illumination a mixture of tan and rich work best. for confidence in a compact, the rich was fine. I got this in Tan and it is perfect. it is a lighter product than the cc+ and confidence in a compact. this is my first wear and if it doesn't break me out, i will definitely buy again. if it does, i still might, but at that point i could look at other products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried IT Cosmetics and I am so happy I finally did. It was silky smooth and blended into my skin soooo well. I have a bit of acne scars and this did great to even out my skin tone and not make them super noticeable. I will be wearing this through the summer and I love that is has 40 SPF as well.

reviews.review_title: Dare I say this is my new fave!?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this CC! It's super breathable and creates the perfect no makeup makeup look. It's like a second skin, only with less blemishes. It provides a medium coverage which aides in the natural look. This is something I could see myself using every day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It blends easily and looks like skin. It's sheer but can be built up to medium coverage. It has a really soft finish your skin looks blurred in person. Says it color corrects, but it doesn't.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the packaging, the texture and coverage of IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow, but I just could not get past the smell of sunscreen.  It wasn't a terribly strong smell, but my sinuses are very sensitive and I can't use anything that has a scent to it or it will cause headaches.  That's definitely a shame - First time trying it and I wanted to love this!  I am fair-skinned and the color was a little off, but that's pretty common for my skin type.   It didn't break me out.  I would not use it again because of the scent, though.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: TLDR: Great coverage, able to hide dark eye bags. Feels very moisturizing Doesn’t really feel like wearing foundation 1-2 Swipes Full Coverage Unscented The pump is quite nice and feels more sanitary than a wand    The Nude Glow foundation is fantastic. It’s a great blend of sunblock, moisturizer, and foundation. I really enjoy how lightweight it’s on my skin. It’s also a pretty good moisturizer, and I noticed my skin was noticeably softer. As a sunblock and foundation hybrid, it does work well I didn’t need to reapply sunblock even while outdoors. Other foundations I wore in the same condition, ended up burning my skin. The Nude Glow looks fantastic on the skin, it has a very natural finish, without being too matte or dewy. My skin looks very smooth with this foundation. Nude Glow also has great coverage  I want to especially praise the coverage because I am not a daily foundation user. I typically like to use foundation as a concealer. As a concealer, I was really impressed by Nude Glow. My eyebags get dark, like a dark grey. With most concealers/foundations it takes a handful of swipes of product, With the Nude Glow, with two swipes, it’s gone, it looks exactly like the foundation. I just need to do some minimal blending into the skin, and it looks natural and smooth. As for the coverage, it definitely leans more into full coverage than other medium coverage foundations. I applied about five dots of foundation to my cheeks, forehead, nose, and chin.  The majority of my skin looked fully covered with one swipe, but areas with darker pigmentation such as my eyebags needed two swipes to be fully covered. Lastly, the longevity is fantastic, it holds well for around 12 hours, even as someone who occasionally touches their face throughout the day. It’s definitely one of the few foundations I would splurge on. If you’re looking for a foundation that you don’t need to reapply or fuss with it's a great choice!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking forward to finally getting to try this concealer as a free sample. I really like the packaging and the application of the product with a pump because I feel like I can better control the amount that I need. The color looked like a 99/100 match for my skin color!  I was so thrilled with how easily it blended that even I had a hard time distinguishing the borders of my test application. I will say after it dries it does rub off a little which makes me worry about it possibly staining clothing but for the areas I am using it for, that should not be a problem. Overall I am very happy with this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Rich - tan to rich complexion with cool rosy undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Tan Rich shade was a complete match to my skin tone and blended in perfectly. The formula is a bit thicker in my opinion and reminded me of applying sunscreen as I had to work the product into my skin to blend it out.  Overall it gives great coverage and I like that there is sun protection built in (even though I'd need to reapply sunscreen later). The formula dries down pretty quickly and leaves a nice subtle glow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: When I received this as a sample I wasn't expecting much as I have very oily and sensitive skin and most tints/cc creams like this don't do well on my skin. I was pleasantly surprised! First the packaging is awesome, it's mess free and travels well. The product itself goes on smoothly even when applied with fingers. This is light and glowy as described but I'm the most natural way that doesn't make you look oily or shimmery. I love that I can put this on and it's my SPF and foundation. Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The cc nude glow ended up accentuating my acne scars. They ended up looking more prominent. I liked that it had spf 40 already included in it, so I was able to skip that step of my routine. This did make my skin more glowy, which I really liked. This one ended up being a bit  too dark and yellow for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I wore the IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow in shade Light.  It went on really smooth and had a light pleasant smell.  Once on it felt so soft on my skin, not at all heavy or cakey. I would call the coverage medium.  I put one half of my face on with my fingers and the other half with a foundation brush, both ways went on really nicely.  It lasted all day long and didn't dry out or crease on me, but there was one spot where I had some dry skin that I could tell I was wearing something.  I do think I should have gone with shade Fair Light as I have more of a red undertone, you can really see in pics how the Light shade leans more yellow but once blended wasn't as noticeable.  Love the pump tube and being able to get higher SPF with  little coverage too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is like all in one product and do a perfect job in my skin. It's for the days I'm in a rush and I want to look with makeup but in a natural way, but wen I used this product with the nice ingredients this have it's like a skincare routine too. The color it's perfect for me and I love the dispenser on the bottle, because this way I don't contaminated the rest of the product and used the perfect amount of product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in LOVE with the CC+ Nude Glow Medium by IT Cosmetics! It is super glowy, without all the grease, oiliness or shine that you can see from 100 miles away, and not the good shine. Lol It leaves a beautiful glowing finish that has just enough coverage to look like it's your skin, but only better. And when it says SPF 40 UVA/UVB sunscreen, it means business! I went with my daughter's 6th grade class camping trip a week ago. Even with our 90 degree weather and blazing sun, I did NOT get burned! I still looked flawless and was able to protect and improve my skin with all the added skincare! Bottom line, I was floored with this cream and it is a win-win all around!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Tan Rich and it matched my skin perfectly. Phenomenal coverage with great sun protection. I love how it absorbs into my skin. It gives me a subtle glow and covers nicely. I experienced no adverse reaction. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the best glow foundations on the market right now. It provides the glow and coverage.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The shades are just awful. I wear a light in just about every brand I have ever tried and grabbed it this time. This was my first time trying IT CC Nude Glow cream. The pigment was awful. I hated the way it felt on my skin. I will not use this again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for travel because it combines 2 products into one lightweight pump bottle. The formula blends nicely into my skin, giving me an instant natural glow. Love that it already has SPF 40 and an added boost of niacinimide built in. This a definite mainstay in my beach bag essentials!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loveeee the It CC creams and this one is my favorite! It’s so luminous without the glitter from the “illuminating” version. Will be wearing this all summer!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I’ll start by saying I don’t wear much liquid face makeup (as in foundation) often and my skin has been dry lately. That said, I feel like this sat on top of my skin in a way that I didn’t like. The sort of sticky feeling never quite went away. The color Light was decent though, definitely yellow-undertones, and I do feel like the product is a true “medium” coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect coverage and light weight. A great spring and summer foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this SPF 40 foundation glow serum because it settles so well with my skin color. Let's just say you sweat, it doesn't run off either! I remember I was sitting outside and a woman yelled outside her car OMG you look so good! LOL I always get compliments on my whole vibe when I wear this makeup. I would also recommend this for beginners when it comes to applying makeup because you don't have to contour your face to have a nice glow.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It definitely evens out my skin and gives me a beautiful natural healthy glow! You can easily build it to a medium coverage without feeling heavy or oily. It also has great ingredients! such as green tea extract, I really love that. My skin feels a lot healthier and smoother.

reviews.review_title: Great, but double check your shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I am currently waiting for this to be available in the shade I think will actually match my skin tone!   The product came out darker than what was shown in the photo. It still had amazing color correcting coverage and a glory natural skin finish. It didn’t even look or feel like I was wearing makeup and when I washed it off it came off easy and didn’t dry my skin out. I definitely recommend this cc cream, especially with how much spf it has since we are getting into the sunny weather!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan - tan complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a must have! I go IT COSMETICS CC NUDE GLOW in TAN RICH. I felt the formula blended flawless, perfect amount of glow and coverage. Extremely light weight. Great for outdoors. It held up beautifully. I would like the shade to be a smidge warmer. I felt the undertone was more neutral. There is a SPF smell to it, but fades pretty quick. 10/10!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade light & I don't know who  created this color range but light is anything but! It could actually fall mor in the medium category. Shade range is lacking. I gave this to my mom to try and she said it has light covered. Set it with a powder but it didn't seem to last very long. I did swatch it and the product felt smooth. A little on the oilier side. On the plus size, it has SPF! I didn't want to look like an oomph loompa so I'll have to wait until I find a much lighter shade to test.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics Your Skin But Better CC+ Nude Glow is the perfect summer coverage for your face. This self-proclaimed “medium coverage skin tint” acts more like a full coverage, which I think is wonderful. It includes SPF 40 to protect your face from the sun. This CC cream blends into my skin color but adds a sun-kissed shimmer. It would the perfect look for beach-going, dinner, or a date night. It also is long-lasting, and my dry skin loves the moisture it provides. The packaging is a slim tube which is easy for travel, and it has a pump for sanitary dispensing. I highly recommend this color correcting tint from IT Cosmetics.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little confused because I had never used CC Nude but after doing the test on my arm I was convinced by the product. The truth is great and the packaging is very nice and easy to use. I highly recommend it and personally it left my face well covered and free of excesses

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Tan Warm - tan complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a CC cream with some lightweight coverage this is a great option. Left skin with a dewy finish, perfect for the summer. I really enjoyed trying this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Overall the consistency was decent and I have really sensitive skin so I breakout easy. This did not make me breakout at all! So super positive there. Yet it was lacking in any actual change to my skin. After applying it, it always looked like I had just put nothing but left that awful sunscreen white cast in photos and in natural light. Inside it looked fine though but I would like to be able to wear a CC cream that doesn't make me look like I have an ashy facecast. Overall, you could give it a try but know you'll probably be needing to boost it with a touch of another tinted cream or even dab of foundation. Not the worst but also not the best.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried a lot of different types of CC cream concealer/foundation but they don't compare to this one. I have been getting small red acne on my skin ever since the pandemic made us wear masks. I really needed a solution to at least cover it up for small gatherings or just video chats. This foundation covers everything and it doesn't break the bank like using the expensive brands that cost upwards to 50 to 80 dollars. Definitely will buy this product again when I run out, it's perfect for covering up redness, acne, dark spots, and under eye circles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Before this product I have been using the full coverage version and have LOVED it. Now that I have had a chance to try the NUDE GLOW version with a medium coverage I think I have a new favorite. I got the other one when full coverage was all the rage and now it feels like too much. NUDE GLOW lives up to the name of giving my skin such a pretty glow. Compared to other foundations I know this is going to give me the coverage I want plus it has broad spectrum SPF 40. Win /win. I will 100% buy this product when I run out. Only change I would make is a slightly lighter color for the winter months.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color match was perfect which was so great! This is def a great choice for outdoor activities - anywhere that you want to look a little made up but it’s definitely light to medium coverage. Knowing there was sunscreen def gave me peace of mind. All in all, I recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this CC and would probably buy this the next time I need another. I received this in exchange for a review. I like how easy it is to blend into my skin. I love that it covers my flaws without looking heavy. I do feel like it was a little to shiny, I love a good dewy skin but this seemed a bit much.

reviews.review_title: Just The Right Amount of Glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the color Tan Rich which will be my perfect Summer shade. I have already decided that this skin tint will be all I wear during the summer. At first when pumping it out I thought it would be thick but I thought wrong. I was able to blend it out to a nice light coverage. It could easily be built up to a medium finish if I used a second pump. While wearing for 10 hour days I only had to touch up on my nose with a little powder. Comparing this skin tint to others I prefer this one as the others I’ve tried were a bit too matte and dry looking.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The coloring is perfect. The only thing I don’t like is that it is a little oilier than it foundation I use.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wowwww I absolutely love this!!! I am not a fan of the original that everyone loves. I hate matte for me. This is a dream. It’s glowy but not oily and the consistency is so beautiful. It’s such a great shade match for me. I am going to wear this every day in the summer because it is like my skin but better!!! It’s like my tan will come through and this will just even it out. Run and get this!

reviews.review_title: Good product but not for oily skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product for the weekend. You want to look out together but without having to do a full face. I love that it has SPF and protects my skin. I received this CC cream for my honest review and I received the shade medium. It was definitely too dark for me so I would recommend going to the store and trying rather than ordering online. The only downside to this product is that my skin was oily within 40 minutes. It look great when I first put it on but it just didn’t last for me. If you have dry or normal skin it’s a great product but my combination skin was too oily for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love that the formula is SPF 40. The color blended really well on my olive skin. I used a foundation brush and it didn't leave any streaks. It is definitely medium coverage as stated but I prefer that. It also gives a little dewy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation melts into your skin. It’s so lightweight and glides on easily. Yet it still provides great coverage. An added bonus is it contains SPF. You can’t go wrong with this foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. It felt good on skin, gave good coverage, and was very long lasting. I would definitely recommend to friends and family

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely had trouble finding my perfect shade I'm somewhere in between so not too dark not too late. Smooth full coverage easy apply no lines it was pretty good

reviews.review_title: This stuff is good, like for real
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If you’re looking for a decent level of coverage without a cakey or obviously made-up look, I highly recommend this product. I’ve done a full face with it, and have used it on its own when I wanted to look more put-together but not made up, and in between and it delivers for all those purposes. The fact that it has spf 40 was super appreciated when I was on vacation and in the sun last week (I burn easily, but not this time). This was my first IT Cosmetics experience and I definitely can say I’m a new fan.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I didn't have the bottle in front of me when I applied this, I'd swear I had applied a foundation. That's how much coverage it provides! Except it feels a lot more breathable on the skin than other foundations I've used. The color blends beautifully and I've found that a slightly damper than usual sponge gives me the most natural look. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium Tan - medium to tan Complexion with warm golden undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First: I love this packaging. Everything should come in this packaging. No waste at the bottom of the tube, I can dispense what I want when I want, and it's nice and sanitary. I love it.  Second: I also love the product. It's the perfect in-between a foundation and a tinted serum. It has just a little more coverage than a tinted serum but not enough to be called a foundation - applies well, easily buildable, and I really love that it contains SPF 40. I think given the consistency, it's also more forgiving on color match and I really like that about it. It stays on all day, doesn't rub off (even without a primer, but with a powder on top) and doesn't oxidize. I'd continue to buy this as an everyday layer, and I think a thin layer would do really well under a heavier foundation if I were ever to need it. I also love that it is nourishing and I love that it contains niacinamide, which I use on my skin frequently as a serum anyway!  One star deduction because I do feel like this isn't good for dry skin -- every single time I wear it (which is most days), I feel like it heavily accentuates any dry patches on my skin. I try to moisturize heavily that night but still something to be aware of - if you have dry skin, this may not be it for you.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cc cream better than the orginial it cosmetics cc cream. I could not give this product a fair shot because I got my wrong shade but i love the glow. It may look a little greasy in the summer but we will see!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this cc cream better than the orginial it cosmetics cc cream. I could not give this product a fair shot because I got my wrong shade but i love the glow. It may look a little greasy in the summer but we will see!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - medium complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was asked to try the CC NUDE GLOW MEDIUM TAN for free for my honest review, and may I say that I absolutely love it, my face just brightens up when I wear it, and I love that that it has a SPF of 40.

reviews.review_title: Wow! This works wonders, love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this matched my skintone so well and the fact that it had SPF in it.  It goes on very lightweight, has a nice smell, and evens skintone very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this is totally my fault not the products fault I loved the coverage and how glow it was without leaving me oily but it was 2 shades darker than I expected which is totally my fault but I still loved it and I’m sure I can still use it in the summer. With that being said if I can get it in my shade I will totally buy it in the future and I totally recommend it my favorite IT Cosmetics Is the CC Matte so trying this one was amazing. I just loved it IT Cosmetic hasn’t disappointed me yet❤️❤️

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. I love ot so much, I will be buying more. It goes on smooth and is really moisturizing. It lasts all day and give me medium coverage. It feels like there is nothing on my face which I love. There is also a good amount in the bottle. I also like that it has spf 40, which helps protect my skin. Over all I'm highly satisfied with this product!!

reviews.review_title: Great for a no makeup look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great for the summertime. It has SPF and gives a great glowly look. The coverage is light, and may need to be set with some powder. The tube is good to dispense small amounts of product as needed, and it is on the slightly thicker side. It blends nicely into the skin. A usual concern with new products are breakouts or changes in skin, but I didn’t notice anything with this product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Medium - medium complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blends really well. Actually looks like your natural skin, but smoother. I got the wrong color, but it still works great. I just mix it with some sunscreen to lighten it a bit. I also use it alone as a bronzer since it was too dark for me. I do wish it came without the sunscreen for us people who live in cloudy states and need the sun.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great spring/summer foundation. I love this foundation because it leaves my skin with a smooth velvety finish and it has the perfect medium amount of coverage. I have been mixing it with my facial oil, and it blends perfectly. I also LOVE that it has SPF!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Ive used a few IT cosmetics in the past and have liked all of them. I’ve been using the CC+ Nude Glow Lightweight Foundation + Glow Serum with SPF 40 daily for about 2 weeks now and I really enjoy it. It feels really light, no heavy feeling on the skin. I love that SPF is included in the foundation. It’s moisturizing on my skin, not drying at all. I would recommend this item to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I tried IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow Neutral Rich and I found it to be a good match for my skin. My only concern is that I have super sensitive skin, and since it does not seem to be hypo-allergenic I would probably only use it for special occasions.

reviews.review_title: Great tinted sun screen, feels barely there!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great coverage and easily swapped with my foundations for days I know I'll spend in the sun. This color ended up being a little darker than I anticipated, I would go a shade or two lighter next time, but this will match my color as the summer goes on. Non greasy, went on smooth and didn't clog my pores nor cause any breakouts!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The IT Cosmetics CC Nude Glow in Light is the perfect lightweight, medium coverage base for my skin. It blends in so seamlessly for a flawless yet dewey and natural finish. This has become my new go-to foundation for everyday use, especially since it has SPF 40. The convenient tube packaging with a pump is great for no-mess application. Love this product!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Light - light complexion with warm yellow undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice coverage for a CC cream, although it seemed to be a little too dark to be called “light” due to this I mixed it with a lighter concealer to better match my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent base for my face every day. The perfect, no makeup - makeup, product to make your whole face evenly colored, hide any imperfections, gives you a truly radiant glow, with a soft dewy finish. Its buildable and easy to apply with your hand, beauty blender or a brush. I have been using it over moisturizer every day with a liquid blush and highlighter stick for a quick no makeup makeup look every single day! It has no scent, doesnt clog my pores, stays all day and makes me look so hydrated and glowy!

reviews.review_title: Glowing beautiful light weight cc cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glowing beautiful light weight cc cream it covers like a full coverage foundation but not heavy at all, also has a nice smell

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Neutral Medium - medium complexion with neutral peach undertone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really hoping to love this and tried it on several occasions, but it just isn't the right fit for me. I absolutely love the packaging, it feels really comfortable in my hand to use and I like that the pump can easily control how much product dispenses, rather than pushing out a lot at one time. I did really like the way the product felt, it seemed really smooth and creamy and had a really nice fresh scent. It did seem like if you wanted it to be, that it could be buildable. So for the negative, I just didn't like the way it sat on my skin. I felt that it wasn't as smooth as I would have liked and looked kind of splotchy and cakey.  I was really disappointed with the finish, because it felt really lightweight on my skin, but it just did not sit well on my skin

reviews.review_title: Love this IT  Cosmetic Natural CC Cream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product really surprised me, after applying the color blend well into my skin, it was smooth, light and longlasting, also natural.
